settings.tracks-token-description: Your token to access Tracks. You can find it under Settings > Authentication
settings.tracks-url-description: Base URL of your instance of Tracks.

messages.server-http-error: The server returned an error. HTTP code is {code}
messages.service-authentication-failed-descriptio: Unable to authenticate. Please check your settings and verify that the username and token are correct.
messages.service-unreachable-description: The service cannot be reached. Please check your settings and verify the URL is correct.
